name: Nonograms: Griddlers & Puzzles
description:
Test your brain power by solving our awesome picture logic puzzles. Nonograms is a classic nonogram puzzle that will help you boost your intellect and have fun.

How to play
The rules are fairly simple. Find the numbers on the sides of each row/column. These numbers will tell you the length of the runs of black squares in each line. Use your logic to solve the puzzle and reveal the hidden picture.

Features
– Enjoy lots of brain-teasing puzzles in different categories
– Discover beautiful pictures
– Solve all levels, from easy to super hard
– Play and sharpen your intelligence

Enjoy hundreds of mind-blowing puzzles that are updated on a regular basis, offering you hours of fun and entertainment!
